query.mssql: create table {0} ([ReportSessionId] varchar(256) NOT NULL, [IncomingLetterId] int NOT NULL, [OutgoingLetterId] int, [IncomingLetterHyperLink] nvarchar(max), [OutgoingLetterHyperLink] nvarchar(max), [Correspondent] nvarchar(max), [RegNumber] nvarchar(max), [DocumentDate] nvarchar(max), [Number] nvarchar(max), [DateOF] nvarchar(max), [RequarimentNumber] nvarchar(max), [Content] nvarchar(max), [Assignee] nvarchar(max), [CoAssignee] nvarchar(max), [PageCountIncoming] nvarchar(max), [DatePerformer] nvarchar(max), [CreateDateActionItem] nvarchar(max), [MaxDeadline] nvarchar(max), [ActualDate] nvarchar(max), [OutgoingLetter] nvarchar(max), [Prepared] nvarchar(max), [PageCountOutgoingLetter] nvarchar(max), [IsExpired] int)

query.default: select * from Sungero_Reports_DocumentsTaxGroup where ReportSessionId = @ReportSessionId order by DocumentDate
